titleStmt.title: Ariel Papers: Copies of Official Papers

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits.

msContents.summary: Bound codex, containing folios and quires of various measurements.

collation.desc: the front cover. Recto marbled. Shelfmark on verso.
156 folios = Copies of Official Letters. Library Arabic foliation 1-156.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: FR. NOUV. ACQ 8919 (spine.
BnF shelfmark sticker: FR. NOUV. ACQ 8919 (spine.

Binding information in black pencil:
Volume de 156 Feuillets
21 Mars 1896 (f[1]r).

binding.p: Marbled (blue and black) paper cover. Shelfmark on the spine.

origin.origDate: No internal dates for the copy.

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Papers of Edouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Edouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Rosny, Léon de (1868). La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.

text.body:
[f1-f2 = no. 348 in black pencil = Item 1. Two handwritten versions of the same document: Tamil version in left column of the page, French version in right column of the page (f1r-f2r). Addressee, in French (f2v). Dated October 10, 1442.]
A Monsieur
Monsieur Du Camper Capitaine De Vaisseau De 1re Classe, Officier de la légion d’honneur, Gouverneur des Etablissements Français dans l’Inde
A Pondichéry.
[f3-f6 = no. 349 in black pencil = Item 2. Handwritten document in Tamil (f3r-f6v). Dated to ]
[f7-f10 = no. 350 in black pencil = Item 3. Two handwritten versions of the same document: French version (f7r-f8v) and Tamil version (f9r-f10v). Dated September 23, 1842.]
[f11 = no. 501 in black pencil = Item 4. Handwritten document in Tamil (f11r). Dated March 6, 1841. With pencil annotations in French (f11r, top).]
[f12 = no. 502 in black pencil = Item 5. Handwritten document in Tamil (f12r). Dated March 6, 1841. With pencil annotations in French (f12r, top left).]
[f13-f14 = no. 503 in black pencil = Item 6. Two handwritten versions of the same document: Tamil version (f13r), French (f14rv). Dated July 30, 1833.]
